column2: ENGLISH
Homosexuality: Norse
As long as you're tough enough to be on top, why should your vassals care?
Celibate: Norse
People still wonder if something is wrong with you...
Hedonist: Norse
Drink, love and be merry, for Ragnarok awaits!
Lustful: Norse
Who could think there's anything wrong with lust?
Chaste: Norse
Don't expect to be considered holy just because you dislike sex.
Gluttonous: Norse
Drink and be merry, for Ragnarok awaits!
Content: Norse
It is fine to be content with your lot in life. But don't expect anyone to think Odin likes you more for it.
Brave: Norse
Courage and bravery in battle is the road to Valhalla!
Craven: Norse
Cowards are better than nidings and traitors. Barely.
Strong: Norse
Everyone respects strength!
Weak: Norse
Even the monks can best you in a fight! Pathetic!
Charitable: Norse
All men can see your great showing of hospitality.
The Norse care not for who you choose to sleep with, as long as you're not weak about it.
Pffh, I'm man enough to sleep with other men!
You... don't want to have sex? Ever? Odd...
It is my choice!
You might have a point...
You enjoy life, and no-one faults you for that!
More mead! More women!
An affair or two won't get the Volva or Seidmenn angry at you.
Thank Odin
You don't want to..?
No, not with you.
A whole pig and two chickens in one meal... you're the talk of town!
And tomorrow it will be two pigs!
Some want more. You are not some.
I'm content
When you stood in front of the wolf, unflinchingly staring it down, all knew you were brave.
I don't even know what 'fear' means!
No norseman can respect someone who runs away from danger.
I don't flee I make a tactical retreat!
Being able to lift up two thralls at once truly makes your fellow warriors respect you.
[Root.GetFirstName] smash!
As the scrawny monk thrall smashed your fist onto the table while the entire court watched, you knew you wouldn't be able to live it down...
He is stronger than he looks!
